content.title: Welcome to Medieval Ark RP!
content.text:
Discover the medieval fantasy world across Amissa, Svartalfheim Premium, and Astraeos. Survive, tame, build, and forge your legend.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/hzyMrwNTD4

content.title: The Broken World
content.text:
In a forgotten age, the world shattered into three great islands, each guarded by ancient powers.

Amissa (PvE) is a land of peace and mystery.
Svartalfheim Premium (PvP) is a realm of war and ice.
Astraeos (PvP) is the cradle of mythological beasts and divine battles.

The ancient Tek artifacts can only be unlocked by defeating the Legendary Bosses.

content.title: Server Rules
content.text:
- Respect all players and admins.
- No griefing, harassment, racism, or toxicity.
- PvE Zone (Amissa): No raiding, no attacking passive dinos.
- PvP Zones (Svartalfheim, Astraeos): Raiding allowed only when players are online.
- No foundation spam.
- Medieval style building only.
- Offline raid protection is enabled.
- Report any bugs or exploits immediately.

content.title: Server Specifications
content.text:
- Maps: Amissa (PvE), Svartalfheim Premium (PvP), Astraeos (PvP)
- Minimum wild dino levels:
  PvE: 150 normal / 180 shiny
  PvP: 250 normal / 280 shiny
- All modern engrams disabled
- Tek gear locked behind boss fights
- Auto Engrams enabled (medieval tech only)
- Cyber's Nanny and Item Collector active
- Electronics replaced with Silica Pearls and Metal Ingots

content.title: How to Start Your Adventure
content.text:
1. Join the Discord and read the full rules.
2. Choose your map: PvE or PvP.
3. Build a medieval character (no tech).
4. Form alliances, survive, conquer.
5. Defeat bosses to unlock Tek rewards.

Your legend begins now!
